detaileddescription.para: Interrupt about DMA transaction completion ! Sets the the "complete" status for completed DMA transaction and ! starts next transaction from queue. Reset DMA completion IRQ flags
Interrupt about DMA transaction completion with error ! Sets the the "complete with error" status for completed DMA transaction ! Reset the DMA channel.

memberdef.argsstring: (DMA_DESC_T *desc, uint32_t *source, uint32_t *dest, uint32_t size, uint32_t dmac_mode)
memberdef.name: dmac_set_desc

briefdescription.para: Initialize uDMA controller with a valid DMA_STATE_T structure.

detaileddescription.para: If you want to use this uDMA driver, you need to call the dmac_init function with a valid state, dmac will init the valid state. If initialized successfully, you can use the other uDMA APIs.

parameterdescription.para: DMA state structure to maintain uDMA resources, this should not be NULL
State is NULL
Initialize successfully

detaileddescription.para: This function disable all DMA channels.

briefdescription.para: Configure uDMA descriptor with source/destination address, transfer size in bytes and ctrl mode.

parameterdescription.para: uDMA descriptor, this should not be NULL
Source address for the uDMA transfer
Destination address for the uDMA transfer
Actual transfer size in bytes
uDMA channel control value
desc is NULL
OK

simplesect.para: The DMALLPx of desc will be set to NULL in this function, and DMACTRLx of desc will be set with right transfer size

briefdescription.para: Set uDMA channel linked-list pointer register, head -> next.

parameterdescription.para: uDMA descriptor, should not be NULL
uDMA descriptor, could be NULL
head is NULL
OK

briefdescription.para: Initialize a channel for DMA transfer.

parameterdescription.para: Data structure containing the default configuration for the selected channel, should not be NULL
dma_chn is NULL
OK

simplesect.para: Channel will be set to DMA_CHN_INVALID

parameterdescription.para: Data structure containing the intended configuration for the selected channel, should not be NULL
uDMA descriptor
dma_chn is NULL
OK

briefdescription.para: Reserve a DMA channel, bind it with dma_chn, and set the dma trigger source.

parameterdescription.para: This can be DMA_CHN_ANY or any valid channel id. For DMA_CHN_ANY, it will try to peek an available channel. For any valid channel id, it will try to reserve that channel.
uDMA channel structure, should not be NULL
DMA trigger source, this can be any value in uint32_t enum
dma_chn is NULL, or channel is not a valid one, or there is no channel available now
The channel id that reserved

briefdescription.para: Start uDMA transfer for dma_chn, set handler function for uDAM callback and transfer priority.

parameterdescription.para: uDMA channel structure, should not be NULL
Handler function, when DMA transfer is done, it will be called with parameter which value is dma_chn
uDMA transfer priority
dma_chn is NULL or dma_chn->desc is NULL or channel of dma_chn is not a valid one or dma_chn is still in transfer
When channel is a aux-based channel, the dma descriptor should not be a linked list
OK

simplesect.para: When callback is NULL, then all INT field in DMA descriptor will be set to interrupt disable, otherwise it will be set to interrupt enable

inbodydescription.para: Check if aux based registers and linked transfer is not supported

parameterdescription.para: uDMA channel structure, should not be NULL
dma_chn is NULL or dma_chn->desc is NULL or channel of dma_chn is not a valid one
OK

briefdescription.para: Clear channel transfer status and set it to DMA_IDLE.

parameterdescription.para: uDMA channel structure, should not be NULL
dma_chn is NULL or dma_chn->desc is NULL or channel of dma_chn is not a valid one
OK
Channel tansfer structure of uDMA channel to be released, should not be NULL
dma_chn is NULL or dma_chn->desc is NULL or channel of dma_chn is not a valid one
OK

briefdescription.para: Wait until uDMA channel job is completed.

parameterdescription.para: Channel tansfer structure of uDMA channel, should not be NULL
dma_chn is NULL or dma_chn->desc is NULL or channel of dma_chn is not a valid one
Transfer is done without error
Transfer is done with error
Channel tansfer structure of uDMA channel, should not be NULL
dma_chn is NULL or dma_chn->desc is NULL or channel of dma_chn is not a valid one
Still in transfer state
